PHYSICS  Multiple Choice  Color photography and the eventual development of the color

W)  Planck’s quantum theory of light

Y)  the three color pigment theory 
Z)  Kichoff’s understanding of the photoelectric effect
tossupA: X)  YOUNG’S AND HELMHOLTZ’S THREE COLOR THEORY OF LIGHT

W)  spend less than 6 hours above the horizon 
X)  spend more than 6 hours but less than 12 hours above the horizon 
Y)  spend more than 12 hours but less than 24 hours above the horizon 
Z)  spend 24 hours above the horizon
bonusA:
Y)  SPEND MORE THAN 12 HOURS BUT LESS THAN 24 HOURS ABOVE THE 
HORIZON

WOULD BE NORMAL
